text:
演出地點: Zepp New Taipei
🌼售票連結請見簡介
🌼主辦單位: 遠雄創藝 、YJ PARTNERS
🌼票價:
1F站席 (請依票面序號整隊入場)：NTD $4,780
2F座席 (對號入座)：NTD $4,980
2F 站席(請依票面序號整隊入場) ：NTD $3,780
🌼粉絲福利: 簽名海報/ 彩排/ 1:20 合照/ 歡送/ 小卡 (各票價相對應福利抽獎活動，請參見附圖)
福利注意事項:
1. 彩排與團體合照福利兩項可重複抽選。
trans:
Event Venue: Zepp New Taipei
🌼Ticket link can be found in the bio
🌼Organizer: Far Eastern Creative, YJ PARTNERS
🌼Ticket Prices:
1F Standing (Please enter in sequence according to ticket number): NTD $4,780
2F Seating (Assigned seating): NTD $4,980
2F Standing (Please enter in sequence according to ticket number): NTD $3,780
🌼Fan Benefits: Signed posters/ Rehearsal/ 1:20 group photo/ Send-off/ Photocards (Corresponding benefit lottery activities based on ticket price, please see attached image)
Benefit Notes:
1. Rehearsal and group photo benefits are available for repeated selection in the lottery.
